narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Smoky Mountain Center for Mh/dd/sas is a Health Maintenance Organization provider based in Sylva, NC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $51.5M in Medicaid payments across 185K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $51.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
